title: anuvAvi malai mEvum
sahitya:
anuvAvi malai mEvum appanE subrahmaNyanE aDiyEnai AtkoNDu kaDait-tETrum ayyanE


anupallavi

  dinamtOrum ini nAn unaiyE en manadil ninaindurugip-pOTri paNindu vandiDuvEn


caraNam    un padam paNivOrai uidiDavE sheyyum uLLam uDaiyadOr vaLLal nIyallavO
enrum un ponnaDiyE Etra tuNai Aghumenru eNNi eNNit-tudi paNNi gati peruvEn
